description: Inspect database table structure for TM generation

table_name.description: Name of the table to inspect

schema.description: Database schema name (optional, uses default if not specified)

data_source.description: Spring Bean name of the DataSource to use (optional, uses default DataSource if not specified)

include_indexes.description: Whether to include index information (default: false)

include_foreign_keys.description: Whether to include foreign key relationships (default: true)
